{% load static %} ### Roster List - You can click the roster file name to open the detail motal. - You can delete the row roster, pay attention, this is a update status action, so you can not choose it in *Install Minion* unit and *Server List* unit. ### Roster Upload In this unit, you can drag your file to the box. **PS**: The file postfix must be *.roster*. For example: **centos.roster:** ```yaml web-pro.centos1.com: host: web-pro.centos1.com user: root password: 123 sudo: True db-dev.centos2.com: host: db-dev.centos2.com user: root password: 123 sudo: True web-stg.centos3.com: host: web-stg.centos3.com user: root password: 123 sudo: True ``` ### Install Minion This unit is used installing salt-minion for some host not installed. **PS**: You should upload your roster file first, then to choose the file in the select frame. ### Server List You can execute some simple command in this unit. My original intention is for some simple test for newbies. **PS**: It is not suggested you to use this unit for working. Just install salt-minion, and Use Salt Minion module.
